DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety clinical efficiency full femtosecond laser-assisted anterior lamellar keratoplasty ( FS-ALK ) cure patient keratoconus corneal opacity
DOC.detailed_description: Keratoplasty widely spread tissue transplantation procedure . Although penetrate keratoplasty ( PKP ) still commonly use cure corneal dystrophy opacity different genesis , lamellar technique provide significant advantage term safety predictability . Al 13 FS-ALK procedure perform 11 eye advance keratoconus 2 eye superficial corneal scatter Before surgery uncorrected visual acuity ( UCVA ) , best spectacle-corrected visual acuity ( BSCVA ) , postoperative astigmatism , endothelial cell loss , central cornea thickness , residual recipient 's tissue thickness , corneal hysteresis ( CH ) corneal resistance factor ( CFR ) evaluate . At 1-year follow-up Confoscan investigation donor-recipient interface perform . All FS-ALK procedure perform Intralase FS 60kHz femtosecond laser follow way . At first 80 % thickness corneal graft prepare . Then maximum thickness recipient corneal dissection perform accord OCT ( optical coherence tomography ) data superficial tissue remove . Transplant fix result bed continuous suture .
